description: This file defines a Lightning.js component called 'Home'. It imports external components (Loader, Button), uses Lightning's Blits.Component system to define the component's structure, state, hooks, and methods. The component renders a UI with animated logo, loader, and text, and contains logic for color rotation and transition effects.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component serving as the home page with animated logo, loader, and intro text.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to rotate the colors of the loader component at specified intervals.
